#summary Demonstration of Latticist applied to 'frogs' dataset

The `frogs` dataset from the *DAAG* package. The data are on the distribution of the Southern Corroboree frog, which occurs in the Snowy Mountains area of New South Wales, Australia.

{{{
latticist(frogs)
}}}

http://playwith.googlecode.com/files/latticistFrogs_A_01.png

The initial display shows marginal distributions of all variables in the data frame. Lets begin by clicking "choose variables" and reducing the number of variables shown:
